data.text: “Mano kaka unune malit un joma odak maber e Sayun,
Dhiuru uneye Kalne, mi uchop nyaka Hamath,
Un joma ok odewo odiechieng bura mabiro,
Un joma nindo e kitendini mokedi gi lak liech,
Un joma goyo thum kaka Daudi nogoyo
Un joma madho divai mangʼeny gi agwetni madongo,
Kuom mano, un e joma ibiro kuongo daro kitero e twech,
Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, ma en Jehova Nyasaye Maratego, osekwongʼore kosingore owuon niya,
Ka ji apar odongʼ kata e ot achiel, to gin bende gibiro tho.

To ka achiel kuom wede joma othogo obiro mondo okaw wadgi mondo owangʼ, to nopenj ngʼat motonyno niya, “Bende ngʼato ni kodi kanyo?” Ngʼatno nodwoke niya, “ooyo,” kendo nowachne niya, “Lingʼ thi nikech ok onego waluong nying Jehova Nyasaye ka.”
Bende farese nyalo ringo e kite,
Umor ka umonjo jo-Lo Debir ka upakoru niya,
Omiyo Jehova Nyasaye ma en Nyasaye Maratego wacho niya,
